member.name: N:LillTek.Datacenter
member.summary: Includes the implementations of the client side of data center services as well as classes common to both the client and server sides of these services.

member.name: N:LillTek.Datacenter.DBDefs
member.summary: Defines internal constants and enumerations to be used for databases by the LillTek data center service implementations. These are defined here rather than in the LillTek.Datacenter.Server assembly so that database packages using these definitions can be build and packed into this assembly as resources.

member.name: N:LillTek.Datacenter.ServerManagement
member.summary: Includes the classes and types used to implement the Server Manager service as well as to access this service from other applications.
